title: Smart Data Models - LinearShuntCompensator
description: Adapted from CIM data models. A linear shunt compensator has banks or sections with equal admittance values.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be LinearShuntCompensator

b0PerSection.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Zero sequence shunt (charging) susceptance per section Default: 0.0

bPerSection.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Positive sequence shunt (charging) susceptance per section Default: 0.0

g0PerSection.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Zero sequence shunt (charging) conductance per section Default: 0.0

gPerSection.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Positive sequence shunt (charging) conductance per section Default: 0.0
